subject: TIEMPO-345: Venue Management map viewport fix - BOTH APPS
body:
Chord,

El Gotan found an issue in Venue Management that affects BOTH apps.

## THE BUG (TIEMPO-345)
In Venue Management (Organizer/Admin mode), venues are filtered by user's saved MapCenter location settings. They should instead be based on the Leaflet map viewport (what's visible on the map).

## ROOT CAUSE
useVenues.js always uses savedLocation/currentLocation from GeoLocationContext. No option to pass map bounds.

## THE FIX
1. Add optional mapBounds parameter to fetchVenues()
2. When mapBounds provided, use bounding box query instead of center+radius
3. VenueModal listens to Leaflet moveend/zoomend and refetches

## COORDINATION REQUIRED
I'll implement this for TangoTiempo (appId=1).
You'll need the SAME fix for HarmonyJunction (appId=2).

Let's coordinate to ensure consistent implementation across both apps.

## FILES TO MODIFY
- src/app/hooks/useVenues.js
- src/app/components/Modals/Venues/VenueModal.js
- src/app/components/Modals/Venues/VenueModalMap.js

Please confirm you've received this and we can sync on approach.

- Sarah (TangoTiempo)
